remarks: Define slot extractor for posets and related structures.  Note that the function argument can be any set, although it is meaningful only if it is a member of ` Poset ` ( ~ df-poset ) when used for posets or of ` Grp ` ( ~ df-grp ) when used from groups.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2015.)
statement:
df-slot $p |- Slot A = ( x e. _V |-> ( x ` A ) ) $.
$d A x $.
